hadiths.text: This tradition has also been transmitted through a different chain of narrators by Abu Hurairah who reported it in a similar manner from the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجِبُ عَلَى الْمُؤَذِّنِ مِنْ تَعَاهُدِ الْوَقْتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Is Required Of The Mu'adhdhin Regarding Kepping Track Of Time
